nodes.text: The Soldier was the main antagonist of The Trickery of Vosdia Nooma, a play put out by Senator Onaconda Farr. The Soldier was once allies with the Paladin before setting out on his own. After Vosdia Nooma, the play's central character, becomes baron of the town of Yusk, the Soldier arrives on rothback and incites the farmers living outside the town to cease paying their taxes of grain. Eventually, the Soldier then instructs the farmers to raid the town, weakened by lack of food and infighting; during the resulting war, the Soldier eats the withheld taxes, as they had been stockpiled.
The Soldier was played by gravelly-voiced Deebo Chak, a newcomer to the acting scene.
